General.Name: LifeSafe Holdings PLC
General.Description: LifeSafe Holdings plc offers fire safety products. The company offers extinguishing fluid products; protection products, including 5-in-1 fire extinguishers and pan safe cooking oil fire extinguishers; and detection products, including carbon monoxide detectors, smoke detectors, and heat detectors. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Wickford, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Sopwith Crescent, Wickford, United Kingdom, SS11 8YU
